channel.title: elections on OONI: Open Observatory of Network Interference
channel.description: Recent content in elections on OONI: Open Observatory of Network Interference

item.title: The Gambia: Internet Shutdown during 2016 Presidential Election
item.description: Last week we attempted to perform OONI network measurement tests in the Gambia to examine whether websites were blocked during its 2016 presidential election. But merely a few hours after we connected our probe to perform tests, it stopped working completely. We suspected that this was due to an internet shutdown. To confirm this, we referred to third-party data to examine whether a country-wide internet blackout was taking place.
